column5: Pike at Toronto, Open May 1st? Or do the boundaries for Division 20(Lake O.) include the islands or other shore spots? If you're fishing the islands, is it Division 20, or Division 16?  Thanks.
if the islands are in the lake, they would be considered park of the lake and be zone 16. but, they like to screw around with the regs so ur best bet is to just call the MNR and ask them directly.
read the exceptions TORONTO HARBOR ie the islands is not considered lake ontario
